long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Great Escape is a thrilling and entertaining Chrome extension designed to transform your browsing experience into an exciting adventure. With The Great Escape, you can take a break from your work or online tasks and dive into a captivating game right in your browser.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the The Great Escape extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

This Chrome extension provides a fun-filled game that you can play between tabs effortlessly. Whether you're waiting for a webpage to load or simply need a quick mental refresh, The Great Escape has got you covered. With just a click, you can instantly access the engaging mini-game without leaving your current tab.

Get ready to level up your browsing experience with The Great Escape
